VOICE_BLOB: I am Mr. Bilbo Baggins. I have lost the dwarves and I have lost the wizard, and I don’t know where I am; and I don’t want to know, if only I can get away.
What’s he got in his handses?
said Gollum, looking at the sword, which he did not quite like.
A sword, a blade which came out of Gondolin!
said Gollum, and became quite polite.
Praps ye sits here and chats with it a bitsy, my preciousss. It likes riddles, praps it does, does it?
